Site.AboutUs: Ocha E-Farm is a Management information system of farmers, it an online system for farmers to showcase their products online to the vast majority of interested buyers which has potentials to benefit Nigerian society and world in its entirety. It a system that provides easy for farmers to sale thier farm livestock, products and animals etc.
